questions.question: When should you begin using the training covered in this course?
options: Immediately after this training is completed
When you have been trained on and requested to implement PPIF's that generate Quality Records

questions.question: Quality Records may be filed:
options: In a department central file area

questions.question: Where are the records?
options: All Philip Mortis records generated after the implementation of the Quality System

questions.question: When correcting a Quality Record you may erase the incorrect information and wait the correct information on the record.
options: Tfno information is required in a particular space on a Quality System form, you may leave it blank.
When creating a Quality Record you must comply with:

questions.question: When creating a Quality Record you must comply with:
options: The training described in this course
